entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding option in csproj for software and fixed point number types #87793
  • [JIT] Optimise `Vector128.AndNot(v1, v2) == Vector128<T>.Zero` to `Sse41.TestC(v1, v2)` #87792
    Future
  • Please backport fix for #84994 (via PR #85001) to .NET 7 #87791
  • System.Data.OleDb.Tests timeout in net48 x86 Release leg #87783
  • Smoke tests failing in CentOSStream8_Mono_Offline_MsftSdk_x64 source-build leg #87772
  • .net8 preview4 AOT windows service process, log component always writes to ETW #87769
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Refactor GlobalizationNative_IndexOfNative function #87767
  • Enable NativeAOT cross-platform build for iOS-like platforms #87764
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Mirrow (ReadOnly)Span<char> MemoryExtensions methods for (ReadOnly)Memory<char> #87763
  • SYSLIB1045 The code fix removes all curly braces on single line if statements in the file #87762
  • NullReferenceException when ManualResetEventSlim.Set #87761
  • Test failure baseservices/compilerservices/UnsafeAccessors/UnsafeAccessorsTests/UnsafeAccessorsTests.sh #87760
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to System.Diagnostics.Metrics's Meter and Instruments #87758
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `ReadOnlySpan<char>` overloads for `StringNormalizationExtensions` #87757
    Future
  • Test failure DataContractJsonSerializerTests.DCJS_BoolAsRoot #87755
  • tiering makes regex-redux significantly slower #87753
    8.0.0

Closed

  • FrameworkList.xml generated in libraries build for live ref pack does not include source generators #87582
    8.0.0
  • Determine behavior for GeneratedComClass on a type with no GeneratedComInterface interfaces #84032
    8.0.0
  • Out Of Memory From Pinned byte[] used in SslStream #76029
    8.0.0
  • MAUI Blazor App fails on load for adhoc release #85722
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient returns "System.IO.IOException: The response ended prematurely" when run in a container #86434
  • Ref-packs built on Windows platform do not include all Intellisense files #87585
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice #87244
    8.0.0
  • Optimize the iteration over all registers in various places in LSRA #87337
    8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] SIGSEGV error caused by NullReferenceException handling on iOS device #87458
    8.0.0
  • Framework Not Detecting On Linux When Executing "dotnet" Command #87704
  • Field defined with profiling API contains out of thin air values #87213
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Physical promotion can create some writebacks too late #87611
    8.0.0
  • Json generator should hoist property values in serialization fast-path when ignore condition on write is set #80703
    8.0.0
  • How to perform ntlm authentication when using alpine as base image? #87568
    Future
  • Guarded devirtualization based on whole program view #86235
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Stop allocating address exposed locals if they are unreferenced #87790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix outerloop CI error #87789
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2204780 #87788
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update WCF package versions #87787
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for DOTNET_SYSTEM_NET_HOSTALIASES #87786
    area-System.Net
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update version of MSDia and default to using shipped versions #87782
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add hosting test to validate behavior of runtime property set twice #87781
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add missing Free methods for our Com interface marshallers. #87777
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 7.0.9 #87776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.20 #87775
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Enable reading process environment variables in EventPipe #87771
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87770
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure that parsed JsonElement values are never marked as disposable. #87766
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Added Vector128 intrinsics that depend on Vector64 for arm64 #87765
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Logger and Logger<T> #87754
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0

Merged

  • fix mono HelloWorld sample #87778
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update generators.targets #87784
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose AVX512 Compare and BlendVariable APIs #87404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [arm64]Use pairwise store in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #87737
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Unconditionally suppress IL2026 for StartupHookProvider.CallStartupHook #87779
    area-System.Runtime, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Use analyzers from targeting pack for NetCoreAppCurrent #87726
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-area-label
  • [PERF] Fix crossgen zip missing error #87662
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fixed System.Tests.DateTimeTests.TryFormat_MatchesToString test #87693
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Cache significant segments computations for layouts in physical promotion #87745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix LocalUses::FindAccess #87732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable GDV with multiple guesses for NativeAOT #87380
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Revert "[mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 " #87780
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • add zero byte read to SslStream #87563
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make sure intellisense files are copied to the ref pack output for the current TargetOS #87603
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some limits in physical promotion #87729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ParseQuoteString handling of non-ASCII chars #87756
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Use local variable to evaluate property value only once in JsonSourceGenerator #87725
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • add review comment to sb files #87003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add helix retries for debugger tests #87565
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Add more load PackedSimd methods #87403
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Insert writebacks in proper post-order location #87612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • CVE-2023-24936: Check type is allowed when deserializing instance types that implements INullable #87702
    area-System.Data
  • [wasm][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87154
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] make cwraps more conditional #87274
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Add support for stripping during AOT compilation on iOS #87728
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Change JitGuardedDevirtualizationChainStatements to 1 #87437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ExperimentalAttribute.cs #87759
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Claims identity and principal debugging update #87742
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline TLS field access for linux x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix library tests, remove MonoWasmBuildVariant=perftrace #87549
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, 8.0.0
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the various Min and Max APIs are accelerated where possible #87641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Make idSmallCns signed to allow including -1 #87373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #87697
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Support config binding ext methods in options assembly #87733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Return Matrix.Identity from static field instead of creating it every time #87723
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Expand interpreter PackedSimd support #87719
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assertion. #87692
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix ID regression in Alpine Linux builds #86804
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from r4/r8 to native u #85964
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • add support for https proxy #87638
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [PoC] surface Quic transport errors #87679
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (3/n) #87688
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
